ygData.subject: Re: mistake
ygData.msgSnippet: keep it quiet.... Verant may be listening and think that it unbalances the game....
ygData.messageBody:
<whisper> keep it quiet.... Verant may be listening and think that it
unbalances the game.... <never say anything positive about your character
unless you want to loose it>

At 01:43 PM 08/18/1999 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "VorRata" <VorRata@...>
>
>Yeah, I've had a problem, as I get higher level, with this not always
>working. I've gotten to the point where I'll jump, crouch and run around,
>it seems to stop me MOST of the time. LOL
>
>On the up side, I've been rather shocked at how things DON'T interrupt me as
>much. At level 30, multiple things can be pounding on me,and I still can
>sometimes gate a gate, DD, or root off. Cool!
>
>-Vor
>30th Level Wizard, Karana
